Hi fans! If you have a chance to enjoy the Sentosa Play Pass with your families and friends, what would you want to do? We want to hear about it! Share with us your stories and how McDonald’s is part of it to mcdsentosa@gmail.com.  Do include your mailing address as we have 10 pairs of Sentosa Day Play Passes to give away!

Don’t forget that you can enjoy your McDonald’s meal with Sentosa Play Pass at our restaurant at iFly too!

Send in your stories by Friday 26 October 2012. Winners will be announced the following week.

Did you know the word 
‘Samurai’ was actually derived from the Japanese word “saburau”? The word means to serve in close attendance to the nobility.
